info.title: Zoho TeamInbox
info.description: Create common inboxes for your teams and give them the comfort of working in a transparent workspace.

get.description: Get all organizations  including organization ID, name, under the specified user.

member_count.description: total member count of the team

get.description: Get all teams created within the organization.

parameters.description: Select organization or enter organization ID

messageId.description: Unique ID of email within a thread

entityId.description: Unique thread ID associated with the message

type.description: Type of  channel associated with the  message

SENTTIMEINMILLIS.description: The time when the thread or message was created in the system

tdetails.description: Complete information about an email thread, including sender, recipients, subject, and content.

teamId.description: The ID of the inbox from where the mail is sent.

createdTime.description: The time when the thread or message was created in the system

from.description: The original  detail of the email, including the sender’s address.

assignee.description: The assigned team member responsible for handling the thread.

inboxId.description: The ID of the inbox from where the mail is sent.

channelId.description: The ID of the channel associated  with the message or thread.

post.description: Compose and send a new email, to one or more recipients,

fromAddress.title: From

type.description: Type of channel associated with the message

archived.description: Indicates whether the message is archived.

createdTime.description: Timestamp when the message was created.

threadCount.description: Total thread count of the message.

teamId.description: Unique ID of the team associated of the message.

following.description: Indicates whether the user is following this message thread.

spam.description: Spam classification status of the message.

inboxId.description: Unique ID of the inbox associated with the message

drafted.description: Indicates whether the message is saved as draft.

trashed.description: Indicates whether the message is trashed

post.description: Search emails in a inbox filtered by  subject or keyword

is_spam.description: indicates whether spam message is included
